title: Over $489M in Crypto Longs Liquidated as Bitcoin, Ethereum Extend Losses
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's drop triggered $641 million in liquidations, but analysts see a healthy correction with a path to $135K if ETF inflows resume.

title: Ethereum DATs are the next Berkshire Hathaway: Consensys founder
contentSnippet: Ethereum co-founder Joseph Lubin believes ETH-based digital asset treasuries will become a “Berkshire Hathaway-style” vehicle for the decentralized economy.

title: British Duo On Trial for Planning to Steal $23m in Crypto—From Behind Bars
contentSnippet: The pair are accused of planning robberies that targeted holders of “significant amounts of cryptocurrency assets” from jail.

title: US Labor Union Federation Slams Senate Crypto Bill as 'Facade of Regulation'
contentSnippet: AFL-CIO's opposition comes as the Senate rushes toward a year-end vote on legislation that would let banks trade crypto with FDIC backing.

title: Gold's Historic Run Dwarfs BTC But Analyst Remains Positive: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 8, 2025

title: Survey Says: Crypto Voters May Skew Liberal But Favor What Trump's Done for Industry
contentSnippet: The diverse, young crowd of crypto investors may remain one of the few electoral sweet spots for President Donald Trump, according to an industry-funded poll.

title: BNB Chain memecoins mint new millionaires in wild trading week
contentSnippet: BNB Chain traders made millions on new memecoins going parabolic, with one turning $3,500 into $7.9 million amid a surge in onchain trading activity.

title: From TerraUSD to YU: Why stablecoins fail to hold $1 and the risks investors can’t ignore
contentSnippet: From TerraUSD’s crash to Yala’s YU, several stablecoins have failed to hold their peg. Here’s why depegging happens and the risks you can’t afford to ignore.

title: Forward Industries launches Solana validator, almost $1.7B SOL staked
contentSnippet: Forward Industries staked its entire Solana treasury into a new validator, immediately joining the network’s top 10.

title: $10B in Ethereum awaits exit as validator withdrawals surge
contentSnippet: Ethereum’s validator exit queue has increased to a record $10 billion, but institutional participants, such as Grayscale, are stepping in to replace the exodus.

title: YZi Labs Introduces $1B Fund for BNB Chain Projects
contentSnippet: YZI Labs says it wants the BNB ecosystem to form a backbone of "democratized access and ownership"

title: CZ’s YZi Labs launches $1B BNB fund as token hits new highs
contentSnippet: The Changpeng Zhao-founded YZi Labs is launching a $1 billion fund targeting builders in the BNB ecosystem as BNB skyrockets to all-time highs above $1,300.

title: XRP as Wall Street’s dark horse: Why some funds see it like Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Seven spot XRP ETF rulings and Ripple’s bank charter decision hit in October 2025. Discover why funds see XRP as Wall Street’s dark horse.

title: Bitcoin Under Pressure as Japanese Bond Yield Hits 17-Year High, Yen Depreciates
contentSnippet: The hardening of Japanese government bond yields could spillover into other sovereign bond markets, capping upside in risk assets, including BTC.

title: Wealth App Stratiphy Partners With 21Shares to Offer Crypto ETNs Under New UK Rules
contentSnippet: The partnership launches as FCA rules change to allow UK retail investors to buy crypto Exchange Traded Notes.

title: TRUMP memecoin issuer seeks $200M treasury as token plunges 90%
contentSnippet: The company behind President Donald Trump’s memecoin is seeking $200 million to build a treasury aimed at supporting the token’s price, which has plunged 90% from its peak.

title: ビットフライヤー、「スカイ（SKY）」の取扱い開始　メイカーダオ後継トークン
contentSnippet: bitFlyerは、メイカーダオ（MakerDAO）の後継トークン「スカイ（SKY）」の取扱いを開始。取扱記念キャンペーンも実施し、販売所での購入が可能となった。

title: Bitcoin risks plunge to $114K as 'predatory' traders squeeze BTC longs
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price analysis gave a new $114,000 bottom target for BTC after a 4% drop from all-time highs, while traders added fresh liquidity.

title: IG証券、ビットコインETF・イーサリアムETFのCFD取引を提供開始
contentSnippet: IG証券がビットコインETF・イーサリアムETFのCFD取引を開始。制度化が進む日本市場で、税区分や課税扱いを巡る動向にも注目が集まる。

title: How to spot coins before they get listed on Binance or Coinbase
contentSnippet: AI tools, onchain data and community signals are influencing how traders spot tokens before they hit major exchanges.

title: PancakeSwap’s Chinese X Account Hacked to Push Scam Coin, Native Token Defies Drop
contentSnippet: The price of PancakeSwap's native token remains mostly unaffected as experts blame the attack on phishing and weak security.

title: Bitcoin to $140K by Month End? Bullish Hopes Remain Even as Tuesday Drop Sends ETH, XRP, SOL Down 5%
contentSnippet: With no payrolls or inflation prints on the calendar until Washington reopens, the market is running on positioning and flows rather than fresh catalysts.

title: XRP Crash Brewing? Prices Continue to Print 'Lower Highs' Alongside New Highs in Bitcoin
contentSnippet: The pattern makes XRP vulnerable to sharp downside volatility.

title: 「ビットコインは金に比べ著しく過小評価」ライトスパークCEO語る
contentSnippet: ライトスパークCEOのデービッド・マーカス氏が、ビットコインは金と比較して著しく過小評価されており、金と同等の価値なら1BTC=130万ドルに達すると主張した。金価格が史上最高値の4000ドルを突破する中、JPモルガンもビットコインが過小評価されていると指摘し、16.5万ドルの価格予測を発表している。

title: Kazakhstan Tightens Crypto Rules After Seizing $16.7M From Unlicensed Exchanges
contentSnippet: The country's plans represent "one of the boldest experiments in tying physical identity to financial transparency," Decrypt was told.

title: Dogecoin Plunges 8% Before Whale Buying Stabilizes at DOGE Prices $0.25
contentSnippet: Institutional interest remains with ETF filings, while mining investments signal long-term confidence in DOGE.

title: トランプミームコイン発行企業、2億ドル調達でトレジャリー企業設立へ＝報道
contentSnippet: TRUMPミームコイン発行企業が最低2億ドルの資金調達を計画中とブルームバーグが報道。低迷するトークン蓄積のためデジタル資産トレジャリー企業設立を目指す。

title: Gold Skyrockets Past $4K, Bitcoin Looks South as Dollar Index Hits 2-Month High
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and gold have diverged over the past 24 hours amid a strengthening dollar index.

title: 米金融大手BNYメロン、トークン化預金を検討＝報道
contentSnippet: BNYメロンがトークン化預金の導入検討をブルームバーグが報道。1日2.5兆ドルの決済を処理する同行がブロックチェーン活用でインフラ近代化を推進。

title: Bitcoin’s Short-Term Whales Now Hold $10.1B in Paper Gains. Is a Cash Out Next?
contentSnippet: Exchange inflow data already showed $5.7 billion moving from STH wallets into exchanges earlier this week, marking an early sign that profit-taking is not a theoretical risk, but an active one.

title: Why Altcoins Are Dragging Their Feet as Bitcoin, Ethereum Soar
contentSnippet: Experts say altcoins lag as capital favors Bitcoin and Ethereum's liquidity, with any future rally being highly selective toward utility.

title: SEC to Formalize Crypto 'Innovation' Exemptions: Here's Why That Matters
contentSnippet: The regulator is developing a framework that could let crypto projects experiment under supervision instead of facing enforcement.

title: 「仮想通貨への投資は今でも遅すぎない」パンテラ幹部が見解
contentSnippet: パンテラキャピタルのゼネラルパートナーがビットコイン、イーサリアム、ソラナなど仮想通貨投資の将来性を語った。ファンドマネージャーの多くが投資しておらず拡大余地ありとする。

title: クリーンコア、ドージコイン保有量7.1億DOGE到達　含み益30億円超に
contentSnippet: 米NYSE上場のクリーンコアソリューションズが公式ドージコイン・トレジャリーの保有量7.1億DOGE突破を発表。10億枚目標に向けビットスタンプ提携で取得継続中。

title: 米SEC、仮想通貨企業向け「イノベーション免除」制度を年内にも正式化へ
contentSnippet: SECのアトキンス委員長が8日、仮想通貨企業向けの「イノベーション免除」制度を年内か2026年第1四半期に正式化する意向を示した。政府閉鎖が規則制定の進展を妨げている。

title: トレジャリー企業とETFのイーサリアム保有量、供給の10％以上に到達
contentSnippet: 企業とETFによる仮想通貨イーサリアムの保有額が供給の10%を突破した。ビットマインやシャープリンクが大量蓄積を続ける一方、過熱へ注意を呼びかける論者も。最新動向を解説する。

title: Crypto’s Retail Era Is Over: Institutions Now Set the Market’s Pace, Experts Say
contentSnippet: Executives from Bitwise and Aspen Digital say long-term institutional capital now drives crypto as ETFs and wealth managers bring stability.

title: ビットコイン史上最高値圏で急落、デリバティブ市場は強気継続を示唆｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインは7〜8日にかけて、史上最高値付近まで上昇したのち急落するという激しい値動きを見せた。最高値圏では流動性が極めて薄く、ボラティリティが急拡大しやすい局面にある。

title: Bitcoin Cools but Analysts Remain Upbeat. Why?
contentSnippet: One observer said that BTC could surpass $140,000 by year's end.

title: Uptober in Full Swing as Crypto Market Tops $4.3 Trillion: Here's What to Expect
contentSnippet: The crypto market hit an all-time high this week as Bitcoin again shattered records. But can bulls sustain the momentum throughout the entire month of Uptober?
